price: Maamkiano yao siku ya kukutana naye yatakuwa: Salama! Na amewaandalia malipo ya ukarimu.
arabic: تَحِيَّتُهُمۡ يَوۡمَ يَلۡقَوۡنَهُۥ سَلَٰمٞۚ وَأَعَدَّ لَهُمۡ أَجۡرٗا كَرِيمٗا
footnotes: Maamkio yao siku watakapo kutana naye ni: Amani na Salama kwao. Na amewatengezea kwa vitendo vyao ujira wa ukarimu utakao waonyesha fadhila zake.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: taḥiyyatuhum yawma yalqawnahu salāmun wa-aʿadda lahum ajran karīman
